Summary: Flight control computer shall start within 5s
Description: Cold start time, including built-in checks, shall not exceed five seconds.

Summary: Display health indication on primary screen
Description: The primary flight display shall render an overall system health indicator.

Summary: Compute crosscheck between dual ADC inputs
Description: The FCC shall compare left/right ADC inputs and raise a discrepancy flag when the delta exceeds 3%.

Summary: Provide aural alert when autopilot disengages
Record configuration signatures to maintenance log
Description: Configuration digests shall be written to the maintenance data channel at power-on.
Automatic switchover between PSU-A and PSU-B shall occur within 50 ms of undervoltage detection.
Built-in tests shall produce a coverage summary artifact consumable by ground maintenance tools.
The unit shall expose a maintenance receive port compatible with ARINC-429 low-speed signaling.

Summary: Log reason codes for mode transitions
Description: Each commanded mode transition shall produce a structured reason code entry.

Summary: Guarded switch status shall be debounced
